get.summary: Retrieves the stock of all unique inventory products identified by brand, given the provided filtering parameters

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Can be specified multiple times. Defaults to US.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the current result page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location id to search for. Can be specified multiple times. Mandatory for itemType PC9.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand to query. One of levi/docker. Mandatory.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: A valid ProductId or list of SKUs that identify the variants of the product. Can be specified multiple times for itemType pc13.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: The type of identifier to use. One of pc9/pc13/upc/barcode. Mandatory.

get.description: Find By Id Endpoint for Inventory

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Can be specified multiple times. Defaults to US.

parameters.name: aggregationLevel
parameters.description: A valid aggregation level, when provided it should aggregate the list of results. Used for when itemType is PC9 and we need to get the inventory at PC13 level.

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Location id to search for. Can be specified multiple times. If missing, it means the aggregation must be made across all locations.

parameters.name: selectedstoreId
parameters.description: A valid aggregation level, when provided it should aggregate the list of results. Used for when itemType is PC9 and we need to get the inventory at PC13 level.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand to query. One of levi/docker. Mandatory.

parameters.name: itemIdList
parameters.description: A valid ProductId or list of SKUs that identify the variants of the product. Can be specified multiple times for itemType pc13.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: The type of identifier to use. One of pc9/pc13. Mandatory.

value.message: Invalid value:'ONLINEr' for field:'channelType'. Only ONLINE/RETAIL is supported

get.summary: Retrieves the stock of the unique inventory product identified by brand and PC13 SKU, from all locations

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Can be specified multiple times. Defaults to US.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the current result page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: A valid SKU to search for. Mandatory.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand to query. One of levi/docker. Mandatory.

get.summary: Retrieves the aggregated inventory stock of an inventory product identified by brand, itemType and itemId, given the provided filtering parameters

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Can be specified multiple times. Defaults to US.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: A valid ProductId, SKU, UPC or BARCODE, from all locations.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: The type of identifier to use. One of pc9/pc13/upc/barcode. Mandatory.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand to query. One of levi/docker. Mandatory.

get.summary: Retrieves the aggregated inventory stock of a list of products, identified by brand, itemType, a list of item ids and a list of locations

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location id to search for. Can be specified multiple times. If missing, it means the aggregation must be made across all locations.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the current result page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: A valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. Can be specified multiple times. Defaults to US.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Not mandatory. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: The brand to query. One of levi/docker. Mandatory.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: A valid ProductId or list of SKUs that identify the variants of the product. Can be specified multiple times for itemType pc13.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: The type of identifier to use. One of pc9/pc13/upc/barcode. Mandatory.

message.example: Invalid value:'ONLINEr' for field:'channelType'. Only ONLINE/RETAIL is supported
